quest.name: The Sordid Cipher
journal:
Little Yang seems quite eager to review your findings, likely because he was not listening the first time.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Upon deliberation, you conclude that the memo mentioned by the mummers should indeed indicate the current location of the pumpkin suspected to be T'maritaa, and that the most expedient way to confirm this is to visit room 201.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

The memo, conveniently not hidden in the least, contains a hint as to where the suspect pumpkin may be found. Little Yang also provides you with subliming scalebombs, which he assures you will remove any foul transformation magicks that may have been applied to said pumpkin.

To your─but mostly Little Yang's─surprise, the subliming scalebomb reveals not T'maritaa, but a Hyuran male of middle age dressed as a werewolf. He understandably flees in terror upon seeing a screaming Little Yang, and must be located once more if you are to understand how he became a jealously guarded gourd.

As you speak with the man─Dawkin─who else should appear but T'maritaa, who thankfully remains a Miqo'te. According to the pair's tale, Dawkin came upon a member of the Continental Circus attempting to curse T'maritaa, and dove in front of her to shield her from a vegetative fate. Though she managed to escape unscathed, she was unable to leave the manor due to fear of recapture, and opted to hide instead. With the two reunited and the coast clear, they are finally free to return to the outside world.
You relay the whole curious tale to Little Yin, who mainly seems pleased to have the mystery over and done with. She does, however, invite you to return to the manor to visit.
Back at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, you report to the Adventurers' Guild Investigator. He is pleased that the crisis has been averted, but advises you to keep an eye on the Continental Circus.
objectives: Use a subliming scalebomb on the peculiar pumpkin.
Report to the Adventurers' Guild investigator.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Good work out there! I mean, I suppose I don't know how your work was, exactly, since I've been here the whole time and all, but you seem like someone who would do good work! So let's review! The...work! That you did!

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: <sigh> If you had been paying attention, you would know that our friend here tricked the mummers into revealing a room number─201─and the existence of a memo regarding a pumpkin significant enough to be kept under guard.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: I see! So that means... Actually, I lied! I have no idea what's going on.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: That memo holds information on the missing girl's whereabouts.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The mummers have an unsettling obsession with pumpkins.

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Yes, I quite agree.

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and assume that you're being obtuse on purpose. But on the off chance that there are two total imbeciles in the room, I'll put this plainly─we need to find that memo.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Oh! So the pumpkin...the pumpkin is...the little girl? Oh no! This is terrible!

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Indeed. Which means that you two should investigate room 201 posthaste and see if you can locate the memo. Off you go.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Hey, look! A thing! Doesn't this look like the thing we're looking for?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The conspicuous memo contains notes scrawled in an unpracticed hand.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: This has to be the one. It says “pumpkin” on it and everything!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Now we just need to count some eyeballs! You can do that, right? You seem like a great eyeball-counter.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Oh, and the eyeballs reminded me of these other balls! The pumpkin-headed lady gave them to me. They're subliming smokebombs that can break any skinchanger curse.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Just throw one at any old jack-o'-lantern you see, and it will turn back into its original form. Unless its original form was a pumpkin. Then it will stay the same!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: That little girl must be so scared. Hurry and find the room─I'll be right behind you. Oh, but not in a haunting way! In a helpful way!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Decoding the memo and checking its solution against the Cellarage room numbers on your map will allow you to quickly locate the transformed captive amongst the plethora of suspicious pumpkins in the manor.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Did you figure out what room in the cellarage we need? I think it has something to do with the total number of eyeballs! Oh, but you probably knew that, since you seem like someone who would be good at understanding memos.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Just remember to use the subliming scalebombs when you find the right pumpkin. Otherwise you'll just be standing there, staring at a pumpkin! Which isn't so different from what I used to do every day, come to think of it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As the smoke clears, the pumpkin remains a mere festive gourd...

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: I knew that you would be skilled at pumpkin identification! And you did it, you saved the little...

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: ...Wait, what?

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-???-)I can finally stretch my legs again! I finally have legs again. Ahhh...

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Aaaaaahhh!

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: Aaaaaahhh!!!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: O-Oh gods, the little girl turned into a large man! It's terrible! It's dreadful! It's the greatest travesty this world has ever seen!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You shouldn't judge based on appearances, you know.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I'm pretty sure that's a different person.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: You're right. Quick, let's go ask if we should be screaming or not!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Oh, that does make more sense, come to think of it! Well, even if he isn't the girl we're looking for, we should probably follow him, don't you think?

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: I found him! I'm helping!

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: Augh! Ghost stalker! Alright, Dawkin, keep it together...

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Wait a minute, I know you. I apologize for my outburst─I'm a little on edge. One minute I was enjoying the masquerade, you see, and the next I'm a pumpkin in a dungeon. It's a bit much to take in.

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Wait a minute, you're neither a ghost nor a stalker, are you? You're just an adventurer. My apologies─I'm a little on edge. One minute I was enjoying the masquerade, you see, and the next I'm a pumpkin in a dungeon. It's a bit much to take in.

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Dawkin!

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Oh, little T'maritaa! You're considerably less orange than I was a moment ago, so I take that to mean that you've been safe in your hiding place all this time?

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Yep, I'm the best hider! There's not a fiend who's found me yet!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Hello, I'm confused!

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Well, mister ghost, I was looking around this big scary mansion for good hide-and-seek spots when one of the people from the Circus saw me and started casting a spell on me─I know because it's happened before. Dawkin jumped in front of me, but he got turned into a pumpkin!

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: I ran away, and I wanted to go and get help, but there were too many people from the troupe guarding the way out...

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Me, I just happened to be lost in the cellarage when I came upon that mummer casting the curse on her─not that I knew it was a curse at the time, mind, but it seemed right ominous─so I shielded her without a second thought. And then I was a pumpkin! Funny how these things happen, eh?

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Unfortunately, I wasn't much good to anyone after that. You must've been scared out of your wits all alone down here.

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Don't worry, I was fine! These nice brooms kept me company while I hid.

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Thank you for coming to save me again, missmister adventurer! And you too, mister ghost!

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: Thank you for coming to save us, missmister adventurer! And you too, mister ghost!

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)My thanks as well. I would've hated to be stuck as a jack-o'-lantern forever. Just sitting there decoratively, serving no purpose...

dialogue.name: DAWKIN
dialogue.text: (-Dawkin-)Anyway, I'd be more than happy to escort T'maritaa here home to her mother. Hopefully next time we meet, I won't be a useless ornament! Haha!

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Wow, that was weird! And slightly offensive! But I'm glad that they're safe and everything worked out, you know, because when the pumpkin turned into a middle-aged man it was so scary and I thought we were in for a terrible tragedy for sure, but─ Oh, do you think we're supposed to tell Yin?

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: It certainly was surreal seeing a pumpkin come to life like that. But now that the mystery is solved, we can go back to reveling!

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: The little girl turned into what!?

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Oh. Oh, I see. <sigh> Well, what matters is that everything turned out in the end.

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: And it's all thanks to Forename! It was really fun talking to you, and joking with you, and panicking with you, and running around with you! Come to think of it, I don't think I've ever had so much fun...

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: <sigh> And now that it's over, I can finally have some peace and quiet. The manor will be empty once again. And perhaps we must return to silence, as well. Not that I mind, but...

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Do come and see us again.

dialogue.name: GLOOMYGHOST03169
dialogue.text: Ahem. Yes, that's quite enough for now. Wasn't someone waiting to hear from you?

dialogue.name: CHEERFULGHOST03169
dialogue.text: You can come back and talk to me any time! But for now you should talk to that suspicious man outside!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: My pumpkin has vanished, you say? How could this be?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: Aha, there you are! I was delighted to hear that you managed to rescue the girl, even without reinforcements. The less the Impresario knows of our resources, the better.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: And perhaps the troupe's failure to keep ahold of their prey will give them cause to doubt the wisdom of their plans. We can only hope─and keep a close watch, of course.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: I will remain at my post here, vigilant as always. If you could keep an eye on goings-on within the manor itself, I'd be grateful.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03169
dialogue.text: Hm, but what to do about the other issue...

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: It is fitting that you bring the little ones delight, for they have watched over you for longer than you know. Heh heh heh...

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: As for how the brooms that made the girl their playmate came to move, even I cannot say, for it was no magic of mine. But no matter.

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: At the grand masquerade of All Saints' Wake, adventurers, monsters, and silent watchers are as one.

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: Permit us our mischief, and we might just follow you home...
